Text: Hmm?
There is a very subtle sense of something amiss...

Sherry stops in her tracks on her way back to the lab
and curiously turns her head towards the school,
whose atmosphere is oddly rowdy.
It's not rowdiness so much as it's...excitement?
Hey, wanna go to the holiday party with me?
Oooh, I'm sorry! I'm going with my fiancee...
Really? Maybe I should ask my fiancee to come, too.

Oh, yes, please do! We'll meet up at the venue and
have a lovely little party together with just the four
of us!
Holiday party...

Where socialites eat, drink, and make merry with
their friends and significant others. It's sure to be
a dazzling event where one's social skills are on
full display!

Her perceptions are somewhat biased, but having
nobody around who knows better to correct her,
Sherry has had no chance to change her views.

Hmm, I've never once bothered to celebrate the
holidays before.

I had no friends to make merry with, and I'd be so
wrapped up in my research that by the time I even
realized the holidays were here, they were already
over.
Hello! We're with the Holiday Party Committee!
Are any of you interested in joining the committee?

We're cool with last-minute entries! We have plenty
of costumes to spare!

Further down the pathway, a group of schoolgirls
dressed in Santa costumes call out to Sherry.
The Holiday Party Committee...

The committee plans out all the events at the party,
and we take care of all sorts of vital behind-the-
scenes tasks at the party itself.

I know we just made it sound complicated, but there's
nothing to worry about!

Really, all you have to do is wear a costume and get
everyone, like, totally excited!

These people seem very sociable and cheerful...gulp. 
And from the way they're dressed, they are truly the
Holiday Party's Chosen Ones!

Surely they must have lots of friends and they always
have fun and... Wait, what?
Sherry...why are you so obsessed with the holidays?
Sherry blinks her eyes a few times in confusion.

Last year, I was completely uninterested in the party.
I ignored the Party Committee outright when they
approached me.

Does this mean...I've developed interests outside my
research?

Have I changed without my noticing it? If I have
changed...then what caused it?
Let's start as friends, please!
Sure.

Maybe it's because Cid and I have become friends...
Maybe that's why I've developed interests outside
my research.
Maybe this year...even someone like me...
could have fun...at the Holiday Party!

If my feelings have changed this much when I wasn't
paying attention, then if I do pay attention...perhaps
I could change even more!
If I can be brave...and take action...

Then maybe I could make even more friends...and maybe
I could see the world in a new light!

Sherry slowly lifts her feet from their frozen
position and walks forward.

Mustering up her courage, she walks over to the Party
Committee, and...
Um, e-excuse me...
She speaks to them...her voice shaking a little.
Wh-Whoaaa!

After requesting to join the Holiday Party Committee,
she is escorted to the costume room.

In the costume room, she slips into one of the Santa
costumes that are worn by committee members.
These costumes are so cute!

And they feel so comfortable... Are they the same as
our school uniforms? Let me see, where's the tag...
Found it.

I knew it! They're the same brand as our school
uniforms. I thought the design looked similar.

Sherry twirls around in the full-length mirror to
see how she looks in the costume.

Her cheeks redden, and her eyes sparkle. In the
mirror, a once-ordinary girl smiles back at her.

I'm so happy I took that leap of courage! It's like,
hello, new me!

So, hey! Have you decided what presents you're
getting your friends?
(Presents...?)

Sherry suddenly hears the voices of schoolgirls from
the other side of the partition.

Nope, not yet. I was gonna play it safe and just give
'em candy.
Ooh, candy! That's a good idea!
Hey! Don't copy me!
(That's right...presents!)

(That sounds like fun, giving presents. But the only
friend I have is...)
Oh.
Here. Have some chocolate.
Huh...?
It's...just...Cid...

She is hit with the memory of meeting him for the
first time.
(Am I...brave enough to give him a present back?)

Okay, lovelies! We're gonna have a meeting right
after this, so we're heading over to the Academy
for Dark Knights, okay? Once you're all changed,
come find us!
Oh! Would you look at the time!

(The Academy for Dark Knights... I might get to see
Cid there...)

(Okay! It's the holidays, I'm gonna try to break out
of my shell!)

Sherry's heart is floating on air. She bursts into
a smile and takes her first big step closer to the
Holiday Party...
